thread.title: HHS Focuses on Flexibility in New Health IT Plan
thread.title_full: HHS Focuses on Flexibility in New Health IT Plan

title: HHS Focuses on Flexibility in New Health IT Plan
text:
23 HHS Focuses on Flexibility in New Health IT Plan 
Nextgov: The Department of Health and Human Services doesn’t know exactly what technology or even health care will look like in 2020, so fittingly the agency's new 5-year health IT strategic plan is centered on flexibility.On Monday, the agency released its final Federal Health IT Strategic Plan for 2015-2020, which is meant to boost everything from health IT infrastructure to community health. The report lays out the federal government’s current vision for health IT and key future efforts important for the future.
